mpicxx   -pthread -rdynamic CMakeFiles/ElitesCpp.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o ElitesCpp  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_mpi.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_system.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_log.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_serialization.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_chrono.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_date_time.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_filesystem.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_regex.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_thread.so.1.71.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libboost_atomic.so.1.71.0 -lpthread
